ques: She let out a long _________ of relief when she heard the good news.
After an intense workout, she was covered in _________.

The fragrant _________ of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.

She couldn't find a logical _________ for his sudden disappearance.
The mathematician solved the complex _________ with ease.
The mystery novel had an unexpected _________ at the end.
The city implemented measures to _________ pollution and improve air quality.
The cat tried to _________ up on the bird without being noticed.
The lighthouse _________ guided ships safely to the harbor.
She had a strong _________ of déjà vu when she entered the old house.
He needed to submit a detailed _________ on the project's progress.
They gazed in _________ at the breathtaking beauty of the natural wonder.
They put up barriers to _________ the flow of traffic during the parade.
They heard a loud _________ as the fireworks exploded in the sky.
The prestigious _________ ceremony was attended by many celebrities.
The journalist filed a breaking news _________ on the earthquake.
They used their intuition and gut _________ to make decisions.
They engaged in a thoughtful discussion to explore the _________ behind their decisions.
His face lit up with a bright _________ of joy when he saw his family.

They noticed a pungent _________ coming from the garbage bin.

They watched a horror movie that made them _________ with fear.

The slow _________ of the glacier was captured in a time-lapse video.

He always approached problems with a rational and analytical _________.
He had a keen _________ of smell and could detect even faint odors.
He wiped the _________ from his brow with a towel.
She had to _________ her enthusiasm when discussing her favorite topic.
The gymnast demonstrated incredible _________ on the balance beam.
He couldn't help but _________ what life would be like in a different country.
They couldn't make out the _________ in the shadows from a distance.
He used a wrench to _________ the stubborn bolt loose.
They heard a collective _________ of exhaustion from the weary travelers.
The dynamite _________ created a massive crater in the ground.
They decided to give the _________ to the scientist for her groundbreaking research.
She tried to understand the _________ why he acted that way.
She could feel a shiver _________ down her spine in the eerie darkness.
She was filled with _________ at the endless possibilities of the future.
She watched the sunset and let out a contented _________.

She could detect the sweet _________ of flowers in the garden.
She read the annual _________ to shareholders at the company's meeting.
He struggled to _________ his anger when faced with unfair treatment.

They need to _________ the budget to ensure there are no deficits.
Winning the _________ was a dream come true for the young musician.
He used a calculator to quickly calculate the numerical _________.
She added a unique _________ to the traditional recipe.
She was drenched in _________ after running a marathon.
The actor's smile was like a radiant _________ on the red carpet.
The sound of the gentle _________ of the wind through the trees was soothing.

He proudly displayed his _________ on the mantelpiece.
The strong _________ of coffee awakened her senses in the morning.
She developed a sixth _________ for predicting future events.
The detective filed a _________ of his findings in the case.
The music at the concert was so loud that it felt like a sonic _________.
The scientist's discoveries left the world in _________.
The philosopher contemplated the _________ of existence.
He decided to _________ into the room quietly to surprise his friends.
The road had a dangerous _________ that required careful driving.
The physical labor made them break a _________.
